resources.string:
This fun little app will tell you the relationship between you and your partner/crush.

 It is based on the flames game logic, where FLAMES stands for:
 ■ Friendship
 ■ Love
 ■ Affection
 ■ Marriage
 ■ Enemy
 ■ Siblings.


Just enter your name and the person you want to check your relationship with then click on the calculate button to get to the results!


 PS. This is just for fun and not to be taken seriously.
